remarks: The imaginary part of the logarithm is in ` ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) ` . Alternate form of ~ logimcld .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
logimcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. CC ) $.
logimcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= 0 ) $.
logimclad $p |- ( ph -> ( Im ` ( log ` X ) ) e. ( -u _pi (,] _pi ) ) $.
